oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Colonel Duff G. Thornburgh Portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Morse's Gallery of the Cumberland
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Colonel Duff G. Thornburg, who was the regimental commander from April 1863 to June 1844 of the 3rd Tennessee Cavalry Regement U.S.A. during the Civil War.
